predicate.note: Frames file for 'deemphasize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: While [*] renewing military aid had been considered [*T*-1] out of the question , [*-1] rejected [*-2] by Congress and deemphasized [*-2] by the Bush administration , Mr. Ortega 's statement provides Contra supporters with the opportunity [*] to press the administration on the issue .
